prompts: Create an electric-type Pokemon with striking yellow and black patterns across its body.
Generate a bipedal creature that has a playful personality and generates electricity.
Design a small-sized Pokemon that thrives in urban areas and loves to run fast.
Imagine a Pokemon with distinct lightning bolt designs and a mischievous grin.
Show me a unique electric Pokemon with two distinctive antennae and a vibrant color scheme.
Make a Pokemon that embodies energetic traits and can be found in grasslands and forests.
Give me a creature with a muscular build and electric abilities, ready for a fight.
